message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1300000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I am only able to pay up to $1200000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1200000 doesn't quite cover my costs. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1250000. This is a significant compromise on my end, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to both of us. Let me know if you're open to this compromise.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to go above $1200000 for the product. I think $1200000 is a fair price given its value to me. I hope this aligns with your costs and we can reach an agreement.
